fortune-i.name: Fortune I Book
fortune-i.desc: Enchantment. Increases your emerald yield. Applied automatically.

fortune-ii.name: Fortune II Book
fortune-ii.desc: Enchantment. Increases your emerald yield. Applied automatically.

fortune-iii.name: Fortune III Book
fortune-iii.desc: Enchantment. Increases your emerald yield. Applied automatically.

looting-i.name: Looting I Book
looting-i.desc: Enchantment. Increases mob loot. Applied automatically.

looting-ii.name: looting II Book
looting-ii.desc: Enchantment. Increases mob loot. Applied automatically.

sharpness-i.name: Sharpness I Book
sharpness-i.desc: Enchantment. Increases damage against mobs. Applied automatically.

sharpness-ii.name: Sharpness II Book
sharpness-ii.desc: Enchantment. Increases damage against mobs. Applied automatically.

efficiency.name: Efficiency I Book
efficiency.desc: Enchantment. Decreases mining cooldown. Applied automatically.

mooderald.name: Mooderald
mooderald.desc: Introduced as a meme currecncy as tribute to one of the support server admins, now its the currency for the auction house. Untradeable.

amulet.name: Bane Of Pillagers Amulet
amulet.desc: The rarest item in the game, it gives you a variety of buffs including +1 emerald yield and decreased chance of being pillaged. Untradeable.
